name: Essay Simulator
description:
This game will test your pencil dexterity with its challenging mechanics. It attempts to recreate the high-pressure atmosphere associated with tight academic deadlines from the perspective of a chronic procrastinator. Relive your worst cram sessions with Essay Simulator! Requires a three button mouse (left, right, and middle mouse buttons).

(This project was a result of cram sessions, so stay tuned for updates!)
